description:
Provides a LogicMonitor collector resource. This can be used to create and manage LogicMonitor collectors.

*Note:* This resource will only create the collector device in your account. See [Downloading a Collector Installer](https://www.logicmonitor.com/support/rest-api-developers-guide/collectors/downloading-a-collector-installer/) for
information on how to download and install an existing collector.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BackupCollectorId.description: The Id of the failover Collector configured for this Collector.

CollectorGroupId.description: The Id of the group the Collector is in.

EnableCollectorDeviceFailover.description: Whether or not the device the Collector is installed on is enabled for fail over.

EnableFailback.description: Whether or not automatic failback is enabled for the Collector.

EscalationChainId.description: The Id of the escalation chain associated with this Collector.

ResendInterval.description: The interval, in minutes, after which alert notifications for the Collector will be resent.

SuppressAlertClear.description: Whether alert clear notifications are suppressed for the Collector.
